alert.note: Alert for Newton; Pope; Searcy (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 18 at 2:05AM CDT until June 18 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN SEARCY...SOUTHEASTERN NEWTON...NORTHEASTERN PERRY... VAN BUREN...CONWAY...NORTHWESTERN FAULKNER AND EASTERN POPE COUNTIES... At 204 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Moore to near Cleveland to near Houston, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Conway... Morrilton... Clinton... Perryville... Greenbrier... Wooster... Oppelo... Guy... Damascus... Twin Groves... Menifee... Perry... Adona... Houston... Bethlehem... Sequoya Park... Hill Creek... Happy Bend... Witts Spring... Rocky Hill... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
